name: Dream Lip Oil for Moisturizing Sheer Coverage
about: What it is: A plush lip oil that glides on like a dream to deliver high-shine tint and intense hydration...Formulation Type: Lip Oil..Benefits: Hydrating..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Vegan Oil Complex: Delivers a surge of intense moisture for softer, more supple lips..- Vitamin E: Works to protect, nourish, and soften dryness-prone lips...Ingredient Callouts: It is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This lip oil has a nonsticky formula that nourishes lips with a blend of nine moisturizing oils for long-lasting softness and shine...
ingredients: -Vegan Oil Complex: Delivers a surge of intense moisture for softer, more supple lips..-Vitamin E: Works to protect, nourish, and soften dryness-prone lips....Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Octyldodecanol, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Siraitia Grosvenorii Fruit Extract, Menthoxypropanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-) Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to bare lips or layer over your favorite lip color or liner for added dimension.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product - it goes on beautifully, the pigment is perfect, and is easy to layer all day without buildup. However, I'm so disappointed in the packaging. First, there is very little product in the tube - most of the space is taken up by the applicator. I also feel like the cap could be made smaller - I love the eco friendly packaging without plastic, but the large top adds unnecessary weight to the product. Second, excess product comes out of the tube every time I screw the top back on, which has ruined multiple things inside my purse. I have two shades of the oil and both of them do this. Because of this, I have started to put it on before I go out, then bring different lip products with me as to not get it all over everything in my bag. For the price, I would expect effective packaging and more product. I've never written a product review before but I would love if these issues could be changed moving forward. As of now, I'm not planning on repurchasing the lip oil because of these reasons, but I do LOVE the formula.

It's non-sticky, and incredibly hydrating, leaving my lips feeling soft and nourished, and the color is just lovely.  However, the packaging can be a bit messy with some leaking and too much product coming out at once. But here's a tip: if you let your lip balm sit vertically for a while, you can manage it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write negative reviews, but unfortunately, this did not work well for me AT ALL. It gave me dermatitis on my lips where I got small bumps, scaliness, inflammation, and my lips felt extremely dry and dehydrated. I stopped for a bit to recover from the symptoms then tried it again to see if it really came from this product or something else. The symptoms came back so I knew I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product about 3-4 times the (very large looking) bottle is already half empty. For $26 I would expect more product. Also the stupid applicator is wayyyyyyy too big and brings out way too much product, which makes me have to scrape the applicator on the edge of the tube. Also I might mention that maybe half of the already small amount of lip oil you get ends up in the top of the cap and then leaks down and gets over everything in your bag or pocket or whatever youu2019re holding it. Summer Fridays please fix this. I love the lip oil itself but thereu2019s so little of it and so much ends up on the lid. Itu2019s the messiest lip product Iu2019ve ever had.
